Class CorpusHandlerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
        • com.github.situx.postagger.dict.corpusimport.CorpusHandlerAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.DeclHandler, org.xml.sax.ext.EntityResolver2, org.xml.sax.ext.LexicalHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CNCorpusHandler, CuneiCorpusHandler, EngCorpusHandler, GerCorpusHandler, JapaneseCorpusHandler

    public abstract class CorpusHandlerAPI
extends org.xml.sax.ext.DefaultHandler2
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: timo Date: 06.11.13 Time: 14:21 Handles corpora and produces DictHandlers.
